ordinary.translation[0].definitions[0].d: average, common, or usual, not different or special
ordinary.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The book is about ordinary people.
Art should be part of ordinary life.
It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
The money is taxed as income in the ordinary way.
Anything out of the ordinary made her nervous.
ordinary.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I thought the paintings were pretty ordinary.
